# Pull Request

## 关联 Issue / Related Issue
<!-- Please link to the issue this PR addresses, e.g. #123 -->

## 更改描述 / Description of Changes
<!-- Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed. Please also include relevant motivation and context. -->

## 更改类型 / Type of Change
<!-- Please delete options that are not relevant. -->
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] UI/UX Improvement (Visual or interaction changes)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Refactor (code restructuring without changing external behavior)
- [ ] Documentation update

## 测试检查 / Checklist
- [ ] Component usage checked (组件使用检查)
- [ ] Responsive design verified (响应式设计通过)
- [ ] Unit tests added/updated (单元测试已添加/更新)
- [ ] Code builds successfully (代码编译成功)
- [ ] Linter checks pass (代码检查通过)
